Stop-loss strategy: Trailing stop loss with 10% threshold, sell if price falls below 1152 NTD or if ROE and ROA decline significantly in the next quarterly report.
Trailing stop loss with 10% threshold, sell if price falls below 1152 NTD or if ROE drops below 25%
Set stop loss at 1152 NTD (10% below the current price) and adjust the stop loss price as the stock price increases to lock in profits.
